custom/flatpak_updates.execute: flatpak remote-ls --updates --app | wc -l | awk '{ if ($1 == 0) { print "" } else { print $1 } }'

custom/restart.execute: needrestart -k | grep 'Pending kernel upgrade!' | awk '{ if ($0 ~ "upgrade!") { print "Reboot required to apply kernel update." } else { print "" }}'
